page.title: 10Employment in our D-block.
page.content: {Employment is the work that people do, in our D-block. The people in Bellfield, Shortlees and Riccarton are employed in various jobs including: canteen assistants, labourers, policemen, storemen, shop assistants school cleaners, farmers and farm workers. But many of them travel out of our D-block by car, bus or train to their work. We found that almost 28% of the people in our area are {unemployed}and that 44% have retired some, through early retirement because they were made redundant.Our D-block employs mainly shop assistants, home helps, school- cleaners, pump attendants and farm workers, but these jobs do not include work for everyone. Dairy Farming is important in our area as farmers employ workers to help on the farm land and to feed and look after the animals.
